name: Dillard Clicker
description:
The space cats just showed up and destroyed everything, including all your nerds rope. Click your way to a bigger army and send your Dillards out to fight.  Bring back money and buy radical upgrades.  Can you rebuild  the Dillard homeworld?

Created in 3 days for the Odd Weekend Game Jam 6

"Yeh dude

this seems polished

I laughed a lot at this one." 

Alex Sicard

"What is a Dillard?" 

My Mother
